settings.ac_heading_1: What is the difference between Masterclasses and LIVE workshops?
settings.ac_content_1: Masterclasses are complete pre-recorded courses of 7-8 parts that have been researched and recorded by us at the Master artists homes. LIVE workshops happen in real time over zoom along with the Master Artist and a small like-minded group. Live workshops have different levels. We only have a few Masterclasses right now - Lippan art from Kutch and Pichwai art from Nathdwara, Rajasthan and are producing and adding more every month. While we cover more than 60 heritage art and craft forms in our live workshops already.
settings.ac_heading_2: I am a beginner, which class would you recommend for me?
settings.ac_content_2: You could attend a beginner friendly live workshop (or even a masterclass if its Lippan or Pichwai you are interested in) and then join the foundations or advanced LIVE workshops. The different levels for the LIVE workshops are- Beginner, Foundations and Advanced.
settings.ac_heading_3: Are materials included in the masterclasses and LIVE workshops?
settings.ac_content_3: Materials are not included in the masterclasses but you can order from our list of authentic art kits and materials in addition to the masterclass. For the live workshops, materials are included in some of the live workshops as part of the workshop and it would be mentioned in the workshop description.
settings.ac_heading_4: What is covered in the different levels of the LIVE workshops and in the Masterclasses?
settings.ac_content_4:
Beginner Friendly- These are usually 1-2 classes of 2 hours each and one of the simpler artworks and motifs of that art style are covered in the beginner friendly workshops as an introduction to that art form.
Foundations- In the foundations live workshops, the workshops are structured to teach you the basic motifs and foundations of that art style , the focus is not on completing a painting but the elements taught in each class are incorporated in a painting and a few different compositions are also taught
Advanced- in the Advanced live workshop, usually the focus is on completing a more elaborate and intricate painting - no basic motifs are covered in the advanced workshops.
Masterclass-A masterclass is structured as 7-8 pre-recorded classes covering introduction of the artform, introduction of the artist, introduction of the different traditional materials used in that art and then 3 artworks are usually taught ranging from beginner to intermediate.
settings.ac_heading_5: Do I get a certificate for completing a LIVE Workshop or a Masterclass?
settings.ac_content_5: Yes, going forward, our platform will automatically award you a certificate on behalf of MeMeraki for completing a workshop with us and being a patron of the arts. This will be accessible via the ‘My Workshops’ section under each workshop that you have attended after Nov 2021.

settings.rt_heading: What are the benefits of joining Memeraki?
settings.rt_text:
• As a Patrons Club member you will get 1% money back on every purchase! Simply put, for every 100 rupees you spend, you will get 1 rupee back. Over time you can collect Patron Points and use them to buy products and workshops.

• The Best Part? Every time you refer our website to someone else you get 10,000 Patron Points! (A sweet 100 rupees directly in your account)

• Birthday Blues? Not anymore. Another 10,000 points for YOU!

• Get first access to exclusive deals, offers and discounts. As a loyal member, you will also get the opportunity to test new workshops and become part of our customer feedback team!

settings.rt_heading: How do i earn Patron Points?
settings.rt_text: It is very simple to earn Patron Points. Just create an account on (website name) and get shopping! Every time you make a purchase, you will automatically receive new patron points. Add in your birth date on your profile for a bonus 10,000 points every year. To get points for references, simply pass on your unique (reference code) to the new user. When they make a purchase on the website, they will be asked to put in their referral code. When they put in this code, they will get a 10% discount while you will get 10,000 Patron Points!

settings.rt_heading: What can I do with my Patron Points?
settings.rt_text: How about, ANYTHING? Use your points for any and all purchases on our website. The more points you accumulate, the better!

settings.iwt_text: Click on the rewards button present on the bottom left corner of the webpage, you can refer and earn Patron Points.

settings.ac_heading_1: What are the benefits of joining Patrons Club?
settings.ac_content_1:
- As a Patrons Club member you will get 1% money back on every purchase! Simply put, for every 100 rupees you spend, you will get 1 rupee back. Over time you can collect Patron Points and use them to buy products and workshops.

- The Best Part? Every time you refer our website to someone else you get 10,000 Patron Points! (A sweet 100 rupees directly in your account)

- Birthday Blues? Not anymore. Another 10,000 points for YOU!
- Get first access to exclusive deals, offers and discounts. As a loyal member, you will also get the opportunity to test new workshops and become part of our customer feedback team!
settings.ac_heading_2: How do I earn Patron Points?
settings.ac_content_2: It is very simple to earn Patron Points. Just create an account on (website name) and get shopping! Every time you make a purchase, you will automatically receive new patron points. Add in your birth date on your profile for a bonus 10,000 points every year. To get points for references, simply pass on your unique (reference code) to the new user. When they make a purchase on the website, they will be asked to put in their referral code. When they put in this code, they will get a 10% discount while you will get 10,000 Patron Points
settings.ac_heading_3: What can I do with my Patron Points?
settings.ac_content_3: How about, ANYTHING? Use your points for any and all purchases on our website. The more points you accumulate, the better!
settings.ac_heading_4: Will I get Patron Points in every product I purchase?
settings.ac_content_4: Yes, on every rupee you spent you will get a Patron Point
settings.ac_heading_5: What I will get if I am referring a friend?
settings.ac_content_5: You will get 10,000 Patron Points on your account and your friend gets a 10% off on next purchase.

settings.liveterms:
• We will be sending a calendar invite and email invite with zoom link to join 2 days before the workshop once we receive payment (please don't select the option for COD).

• The workshops are attended by beginners as well as others who may already be acquainted with art hence, we will keep a pace that everyone is comfortable with.

• We will share a recording of the workshop after the workshop, so even if you miss anything please don't worry as you can still follow again from the recording. The artists mostly speak in Hindi, Memeraki team will be moderating and translating.

• Workshop will be conducted over Zoom. If you don't already use Zoom, please download the zoom app on your phone or laptop (easier to sit on a desk with a laptop or with the phone on a stand so you can see the artist paint and follow at the same time and so that the artist can also see you painting. Please sit in a well-lit place)

• Please test audio and video on zoom. Please stay on mute during the workshop so that everyone can hear the artist, please unmute anytime you wish to ask a question. We may also request you to switch off video at some points as the locations where the artists are sometimes don’t have good bandwidth (we have tested and it works fine usually)

• Please also join our Facebook group to keep in touch with us and other participants https://www.facebook.co/groups/1632293370227782. Class is not transferable to another person - please do not share the zoom class link with others once you have registered and please join with the registered email address.
settings.recterms: Enter the Terms and Conditions workshop recordings here.

settings.heading: What is the difference between Masterclasses and LIVE workshops?
settings.content: Masterclasses are complete pre-recorded courses of 7-8 parts that have been researched and recorded by us at the Master artists homes. LIVE workshops happen in real time over zoom along with the Master Artist and a small group. Live workshops have different levels. We only have a few Masterclasses right now - Lippan art from Kutch and Pichwai art from Nathdwara, Rajasthan and are producing and adding more every month. While we cover more than 60 heritage art and craft forms in our live workshops already.

settings.heading: I am a beginner, which class would you recommend for me?
settings.content: You could attend a beginner friendly live workshop (or even a masterclass if its Lippan or Pichwai you are interested in) and then join the foundations or advanced LIVE workshops. The different levels for the LIVE workshops are- Beginner, Foundations and Advancedyour store.

settings.heading: Are materials included in the masterclasses and LIVE workshops?
settings.content: Materials are not included in the masterclasses but you can order from our list of authentic art kits and materials in addition to the masterclass. For the live workshops, materials are included in some of the live workshops as part of the workshop and it would be mentioned in the workshop description.

settings.heading: What is covered in the different levels of the LIVE workshops and in the Masterclasses?
settings.content:
Beginner Friendly- These are usually 1-2 classes of 2 hours each and one of the simpler artworks and motifs of that art style are covered in the beginner friendly workshops as an introduction to that art form.
Foundations- In the foundations live workshops, the workshops are structured to teach you the basic motifs and foundations of that art style , the focus is not on completing a painting but the elements taught in each class are incorporated in a painting and a few different compositions are also taught
Advanced- in the Advanced live workshop, usually the focus is on completing a more elaborate and intricate painting - no basic motifs are covered in the advanced workshops.
Masterclass-A masterclass is structured as 7-8 pre-recorded classes covering introduction of the artform, introduction of the artist, introduction of the different traditional materials used in that art and then 3 artworks are usually taught ranging from beginner to intermediate.

settings.heading: Do I get a certificate for completing a LIVE Workshop or a Masterclass?
settings.content: Yes, going forward, our platform will automatically award you a certificate on behalf of MeMeraki for completing a workshop with us and being a patron of the arts. This will be accessible via the ‘My Workshops’ section under each workshop that you have attended after Nov 2021.

settings.heading: I do not live in India, can I still attend a LIVE Workshop? Will you ship materials internationally?
settings.content: Yes, we have many patrons attending our workshops from across the world. We ship the art kits internationally for the workshops where materials are included. International shipping charges are INR2000. Even if you are ordering an art kit separately in addition to a MASTERCLASS, we can ship internationally.

settings.heading: Will I have access to the recording of the workshop after the workshop?
settings.content: Yes, you will be able to access the recording of all the workshops you have attended through the ‘My Workshops’ section to be able to practice at your own pace later.

settings.heading: What happens to the recordings of the previous workshops I have attended?
settings.content: The previous workshops recordings will still be available to you via google drive as earlier. But going forward for all new workshops post Nov 2021, the workshops will be accessible through our website and platform only.

settings.liveterms:
• The image shown here is representative to help visualize the painting in a home setting. Price specified is for unframed painting and the painting would be sent without a frame unless specified otherwise in the description.
• All paintings are mostly made to order and take 2-3 weeks
• COD cannot be accepted as a payment option for paintings
• Certificate of Authentication will be provided
• Please write to us at yosha.gupta@memeraki.com for any customisation in size or ping us on the website chat

settings.internWords: I am a Full Stack Developer. I am excited to learn and grow my skills with my peers at Memeraki. All the members at Memeraki are such welcoming and amazing people. I am glad to be a part of it.

I am a multi-disciplinary learner and believer in constant change. I thrive on researching and finding something new everyday. It feels great to be part of Memeraki where I get the opportunity to fulfill my aspirations!
I am a design student, and I am very excited to be a part of the Memeraki family. I look forward to contributing my aesthetic ideas to this culture-tech platform.
I am interning at Memeraki to learn how to bring traditional art into the urban world!
I'm a blockchain developer, here to contribute to the Indic revolution that MeMeraki is leading.
